tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voter_registration_information (
    voter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address TEXT,
    voter_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE voter_registration (
    voter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    voter_address TEXT,
    voter_age INT,
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE voter_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id UUID,
    registration_status VARCHAR(10),
    registration_date DATE,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE voter_addresses (
  address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  voter_id INT REFERENCES voter_records(voter_id),
  street_address VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  postal_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE voting_centers (
    center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(255),
    center_location VARCHAR(255),
    district_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (district_id) REFERENCES voting_districts(district_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    election_year INT,
    vote_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voters (
    voter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE voter_addresses (
    address_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT REFERENCES voters(voter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    address_line1 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    address_line2 VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE voter_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT REFERENCES voters(voter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    registration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    last_voted_date DATE,
    party_affiliation VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_preferences (
    preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT REFERENCES voters(voter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    prefer_sms BOOLEAN,
    prefer_email BOOLEAN,
    prefer_mail BOOLEAN
);
